com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.monitoring

Class ExceptionMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.monitoring.JmxMonitor
      • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.monitoring.ExceptionMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExceptionMonitorMXBean, EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    @WebListener
public class ExceptionMonitor
extends JmxMonitor
implements ExceptionMonitorMXBean
    Global exception monitor to be used to record thrown exceptions.

    To replace the statically created and stored pseudo-singleton with a custom implementation simply use the setInstance(ExceptionMonitor) method. All newly recorded exceptions are then delegated to the given instance.

      • recordException

        public boolean recordException(Throwable throwable)
        Stores the given Throwable and updates the statistic methods like getTotalNumberOfExceptionsLast01h().
        Parameters:
        throwable - The exception to record.
        Returns:
        true, if this exception was not already recorded; false, else.
